dt: {bc}one that retires from society and lives in solitude especially for religious reasons {bc}{sx|recluse||}

et: Middle English {it}heremite, eremite{/it}, from Anglo-French, from Late Latin {it}eremita{/it}, from Late Greek {it}erēmitēs{/it}, from Greek, adjective, living in the desert, from {it}erēmia{/it} desert, from {it}erēmos{/it} desolate
shortdef: one that retires from society and lives in solitude especially for religious reasons : recluse
